plurals.description: Plural form content description for number of new notifications [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
plurals.name: mtrl_badge_content_description

resources.string:
Hi, I'm @nalas XDA, developer of ThundeRStormS Kernel.
This app is a mod of "hKtweaks"\ by corsicanu and "MTweaks" by MoroGoku, properly adaptated to exynos7870/7880/7884/7885/7904/8890 devices (maybe even more).

Thanks Willi for this great app, special thanks to MoroGoku and corsicanu for their awesome thunderTweaks and MTweaks apps. Thanks for Rohan D. and graphics projects for XDA@Franz S. and XDA@phghost, @nckmml, XDA@VHFG22, @Game Over, XDA@matt_988 and XDA@Kyo-Ito
Device will charge faster when this option is enabled. Replug your charger when changing this option.
You have to add actions first!
Could you add feature x and y?
That\'s hard to say. I try to add all features, but it\'s hard to make this app universal for all devices.
An efficient workaround for msm-adreno-tz\'s overheads. Developed by arter97.
All in One HotPlug for Qualcomm devices. Developed by Shoaib0597.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s MPDecision. Developed by Alucard.
Show update notifications when new version ia available
After apply on boot with visible notification, show a notification afterwards with the confirmation that apply on boot was successful.
Hide the notification of apply on boot. Delay will still remain!
In profiles mode your changes won\'t have an impact on apply on boot.
Apply on boot service is already running. Please wait until it finishes.

Use a shell script to apply settings. Please only enable this if you have troubles with apply on boot. If the problem still persists after enabling this option, please make sure no other app is conflicting with ThunderTweaks.
Test apply on boot. This includes all kind of things which are getting applied during booting, such as custom controls, profiles, init.d, etc.
Show toast when settings got applied.
Update %1$s is available to download. By downloading the latest update you will get the latest features, improvements and bug fixes for %2$s.

Update %1$s is available to download.

You can get these new features:
%2$s
Update %1$s of %2$s is available to download
You\'ve got the latest version available of %s!
Mixes together left and right channels
Enable or Disable the sound control\nDisabled
Enable or Disable the sound control\nEnabled
An in-kernel replacement for Exynoss. Developed by mrg666. Modded by @nalas XDA
Don\'t turn on any cores when charge is below the selected capacity.
Allows the 4 BIG Cores to go to the maximum frequency, increases the performance, but will consume more battery.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s MPDecision. Developed by Code_Blue team.
Set a limit for the capacity to which the battery will be charged by passing a value between 0 and 100.
You can block any kernel wakelock you want.\nDisable the wakelock to block it, and Enable it to allow it.
Minimum interval a CPU is boosted.
Set the relative intensity of the LED when in bright environments.
Use exponential backlight mode instead of linear mode.
Voltage supplied to the ISP power plane
Voltage supplied to the Display power plane
Voltage supplied to the internal auxiliary IP blocks, such as the hardware video decoders, the scaling blocks, the display controllers, and the MMC controllers
Voltage supplied to the CCI and memory controllers
Threshold when big CPUs should be turned off.
Threshold when big CPUs should be turned on.
Launch default camera by drawing a circle on the screen.
Policy decides the CFS scheduler how to balance tasks onto different CPU unit.

* Added new features to HMP and Samsung Hotplug section
 
* Added New CPU Input Boost in CPU
 
* Added DevFreq section in CPU Misc.
 \* Added support for PowerSuspend v1.9.
Set a duration when the wake controls will be disabled after the screen goes off while charging.
Set charging current. Caution: Exceeding 1250mA may damage your charging driver.
Wake controls will only be active when device is charging.
Check if there is a new update of ThunderTweaks
Vote for threshold to offline CPUs.
Vote for threshold to online CPUs.
An in-kernel replacement for ARM big.LITTLE systems. Developed by Sultan Qasim Kha and Christopher R. Palmer.
Qualcomm\'s hotplugging solution. Sorry you can\'t turn it off. #blameqcom
Why doesn\'t my determined CPU freq stick?

This could be due to many reasons. Many kernels nowadays have their own hotplugging system which controls the CPU frequency and CyanogenMod has their own CPU Boost implementation which regulate the frequency. I would suggest you don\'t touch the CPU frequencies and let the kernel do its job. This also counts for other functions! If they don\'t stick, it\'s because the kernel/system doesn\'t want to let you change it.
The CPU governor determines how the CPU behaves in response to changes in workload. Changing the governor will impact how the CPU scales through the frequency steps available to your CPU.

Failed to read current governor of CPU.\n\nIf you are using a QCOM big.LITTLE device this is a known problem. The system forces the CPU to turn off cores making it extremely hard to read out CPU specific stats. Try to select this option again. The CPU sometimes refuses to turn on a core.
The number in the parentheses indicates the amount of cores online at any time.
When you activate Individual Control, the Global Control bar will return to its initial position and you can freely vary the individual bars\n\nIndividual Control Enabled
When you activate Individual Control, the Global Control bar will return to its initial position and you can freely vary the individual bars\n\nGlobal Control Enabled
Set the maximum frequency the CPU scales up to.
Set the maximum frequency the CPU scales up to when the screen is off.
Set the minimum frequency the CPU scales down to.
CPUQuiet implements pluggable policies for forcing cpu cores into quiescent state. Appropriate policies will save power without hurting performance.
The higher, the less CPUs are used.
Temperature to start shutting down CPUs.
Maximum number of CPUs boosted at the same time.
Maximum amount CPUs that should be online.
Minimum amount CPUs that should be online.
Number of CPUs online when touching screen or pressing button.
CRC is a mechanism aiming to prevent data corruption when enabled. Data blocks can lose up to 30%% of their performance.
In this section you can create or import custom controls, which don\'t exist in the app (yet).
Cycles to wait after the last hotplug event to unplug another core.
Cycles to wait after the last hotplug event to plug another core.
Share your settings with others! Kernel Adiutor will automatically collect information and compile a score list available to all people.
You can access the list on grarak.com.
Data sharing is active! Click to learn more about this feature.
Allows you to activate debug mask for operations.
Reduces some CPU usage in return for less memory savings.

Attempts to increase performance by avoiding paging on physical storage, instead using a compressed virtual device in RAM. Paging takes place in RAM until it is necessary to use the swap space on physical storage.
First disable ZRAM to be able to adjust the size.
I won\'t fall for this scam!

This feature is only available when the donation app is installed! Don\'t worry though. Because this app is open source you can easily build it yourself and remove this check. But I hope you support developers anyway. Thanks for using Kernel Adiutor! Once you bought the donation app you have to restart Kernel Adiutor in order to enable all features.
I love this app. Must donate!

ThunderTweaks is an app based on \"hKtweaks"\ by corsicanu and \"MTweaks\" by MoroGoku, properly adaptated to exynos7870/7880/7884/7885/7904/8890 devices (maybe even more).\nIf you appreciate my work and you want to donate to support my work and provide me more coffee, you can do it on the following Paypal link.

Hi, ThunderTweaks is an application based on "Kernel Adiutor" by Willi Ye, aka Grarak.

It has several new modifications and adjustments, especially for the latest Samsung Galaxy S7.

I do this because I have fun and I like to share my work, that's why it's free and does not carry advertising.

Although if you liked the work I have done and you want to donate something and invite me to a beer, as they say, you can do it in the following Paypal link.
Threshold for determining if the given workload is idle.
Minimum interval a CPU is kept online.
Couldn\'t find any supported kernels! Please check your internet access.
Lock your device by double tapping on the top of the screen.
Wake up your device by double tapping the screen.
CPU DVFS min/max limitation determined by decision mode.
CPU DVFS min/max limitation determined by temperature.
When enabled and screen is on, fsync operation is asynchronous. When screen is off, this operation is done synchronously.
If your device doesn\'t support Init.d by default, you can enable this to emulate its behaviour.

If disabled, the charger chip will ignore unstable currents. Use at risk of your charger or charging ports. Unstable power detection will reduce the input current until a stable voltage from the power source is achieved.
Are you sure you want to delete this equalizer profile?
Sets the time period of the rising slope.
Sets the time period of the falling slope.
Enable or disable LED fade-in/out (ramp) control.
Enable for fading, disable for blinking.
Improve latencies by instantly putting online all CPUs if current load on any CPU is above a certain threshold.
Sets the minimum frequency the CPU scales down to when fast lane reaches the above load.
If you don\'t know what this control does, then simply don\'t touch it. Please do a proper research before playing with your expensive hardware.
Why don\'t features x and y show up?
Only features which are supported by your device are shown!
This will boost your minimum CPU speed if you touch the fingerprint (HOME) button.
Use fingerprint to pass security check. This will work as long you have fingerprints registered.
The threshold to online all CPUs.
Do you want to run your actions? Your device will reboot into recovery and the actions will run in the order as you added them.
Use cards for items if possible.
The frequency at which the other (instead of x the # of the core) core is hotplugged in - turned on (probably based on the frequency of the previous core or core 0)
The frequency at which the other (instead of x the #-1 of the core) core is hotplugged out - turned off (probably based on the frequency of the previous core or core 0)
The frequency at which the other (instead of x the # of the core) core is hotplugged in - turned on (probably based on the frequency of the previous core or core 0)
The frequency at which the other (instead of x the #-1 of the core) core is hotplugged out - turned off (probably based on the frequency of the previous core or core 0)
The frequency at which the other (instead of x the # of the core) core is hotplugged in - turned on (probably based on the frequency of the previous core or core 0)
The frequency at which the other (instead of x the #-1 of the core) core is hotplugged out - turned off (probably based on the frequency of the previous core or core 0)
This allows to debug the CPUs throttle when the temperature reaches maximum.
Disable for better file system performance at the risk of data loss in case of a system crash.
After selecting a profile, please turn your screen off and on.
Editor will return whatever was entered.
Current value of the editor. Can be basically anything.
Only give sleepers 50%% of their service deficit. Disabling this can save a little battery power.
This is a non commercial ad! Do not take this seriously! Just a funny way to fill the space when an actual ad doesn\'t load (looking at you adblock users).
Enabling this will let you use your phone even while wearing gloves.
The various configuration items which are Governor-dependent.
Set the 2D governor of the GPU.
Set the maximum 2D frequency the GPU scales up to.
Set the value for Adreno Boost
Set the governor of the GPU.
Set the maximum frequency the GPU scales up to.
Set the minimum frequency the GPU scales down to.

COARSE DEMAND power policy is to control only external power (PMU for G3D). It is better at saving power and performance. COARSE DEMAND turns off GPU power in case of being no job for 100ms and turns it on in case of incomming first job on the state of GPU off. Default is coarse_demand.
Exynos TMU control decrease GPU freq from max DVFS step to this freq if GPU temp is 90C
Exynos TMU control decrease GPU freq from max DVFS step to this freq if GPU temp is 95C
Exynos TMU control decrease GPU freq from max DVFS step to this freq if GPU temp is 100C
Exynos TMU control decrease GPU freq from max DVFS step to this freq if GPU temp is 105C
In this section can control GPU temperature throttle mechanism at your OWN RISK!
Exynos TMU control trip GPU freq to this freq if GPU temp is 110C
Do I have to donate in order to use those premium features?
No, this application is open source. You can easily build it yourself. Donation features are enabled by default once you build a debugging apk, so no need to change any line of code.
Number of samples taken in consideration for average load across CPUs. Lower means quicker/more erratic.
You have to hit test first!
Adjust HMP ratios for up/down scaling for tasks migrating between LITTLE cores and big cores. Higher up-threshold values use less battery because use more of the power efficient Little cores.
Max load allowed for tasks migrating to the slower little cores.
Select your profile for HMP thresholds.
Min load required for migrating tasks to the faster big cores.
Hotplug Boost is similar to input boost but it occurs when CPUs go online.
More than one hotplugging system is enabled!\nPlease only use one.
The lower it is, the faster response.

string.description: Content description for an icon that appears in the title area of a dialog
string.name: icon_content_description

resources.string: If the first core is below this frequency, then don\'t plug the other cores.

Number of events to wait before ramping down the frequency. The idlewait\'th events before current one must be all idle before Adreno idler ramps down the frequency. This implementation is to prevent micro-lags on scrolling or playing games. Adreno idler will more actively try to ramp down the frequency if this is set to a lower value.
Duration Boost of Devfreq in ms.
Version of import file is too old!
CPU frequency to be boosted to this frequency upon input detection.
Minimum interval a CPU is boosted when input is detected.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s MPDecision. Developed by faux123.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s Thermald. Developed by faux123 and alucard_24.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s Thermald. Developed by faux123.
Minimum interval a CPU is boosted.
Used to make the hotplug consider the I/O time as CPU load time.
Maintain I/O statistics for this storage device. Disabling will break I/O monitoring apps.
Wake controls will only be active when you put your device into sleep with the power key.
Kill LMK when swap is in use.
How full swap needs to be to kill LMK.
Reduces memory usage but has an impact on the CPU usage.
This increases the threshold to ramp up or down GPU frequencies. The lower it is, the more performance you get.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s MPDecision. Developed by arter97.
Test the led with your settings.
Only require 1st and 4th button to trigger Sweep2Wake.
AppUpdater is a library that checks for your apps\' updates on Google Play, GitHub, Amazon and F-Droid, showing a Material dialog, Snackbar or notification when a new version is available.
Thanks for purchasing the donation app! Unfortunately license check failed. Please try again later. If it\'s still not working, please contact me. You need internet access!
Make LMK more aggressive dynamically when a thrashing scenario is detected.
The % of load of the core (instead of x the # of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled up.
The % of load of the core (instead of y the #-1 of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled down.
The % of load of the core (instead of x the # of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled up.
The % of load of the core (instead of y the #-1 of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled down.
The % of load of the core (instead of x the # of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled up.
The % of load of the core (instead of y the #-1 of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled down.
The threshold to online all CPUs.
Minimum interval a CPU is boosted.
Set the relative intensity of the LED when in low brightness environments.
Turn on profile for use low power mode.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s MPDecision. Developed by franciscofranco.
Enabling the master sequence will disable and ignore Samsung\'s profiles and scenarios, the ROM controls will be disabled.
Allows you to increase the LCD screen brightness higher than it\'s possible on stock.
Maximum amount of big CPUs that should be online.
Maximum number of big CPUs that will be online.
Maximum amount of little CPUs that should be online.
Maximum number of LITTLE CPUs that will be online.
Maximum number of CPUs that will be online when the screen is off.
Maximum number of CPUs that will be online.
Max CPU percentage to use when merging pages.
Maximum compression ratio, as percentage, for an acceptable compressed page. Any page that does not compress by at least this ratio will be rejected.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s MPDecision. Developed by show-p1984.
Try to group tasks into the least cores possible.

The downloaded file has a different MD5. This has following reasons:

• The downloaded file is corrupted
• The developer has declared a wrong MD5

Try to download the file again. If you still get this error, please contact the developer of this kernel.
Memory pool percentage of main memory that may be used as compressed page cache.
Allows you to decrease the LCD screen brightness lower than it\'s possible on stock.
Minimum amount of big CPUs that should be online.
Minimum amount of little CPUs that should be online.
Minimum number of CPUs that will be online when the screen is off.
Minimum number of CPUs that will be online.
Minimum amount of big CPUs that should be online.
Adiutor is Latin and means helper.
You can adjust the headphone and speaker gain.\nDO IT WITH CAUTION!, excessive volume could damage your ears or the speaker.
Qualcomm\'s hotplugging solution. You might get problems with changing frequencies when this is enabled.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s MPDecision. Developed by myfluxi.

string.description: Label for the start date in a range selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]

resources.string: Tap to switch to selecting a year
Enable inverting the screen colors by quickly pressing MENU button 4 times.
No profile found! You have to create them first.
This enables the user to disable the lookup logic involved with IO merging requests in the block layer.
This controls how many requests may be allocated in the block layer for read or write requests.
Time before turning off a CPU.
Don\'t offline a CPU if it drops under the lower levels up threshold load.
This section shows you what things will happen when your device boots up. If it\'s blank, then nothing will happen after boot.
Time before turning on a CPU.
Disable to remove manufacturer limits on undervolting
If something else plugs in the CPU, fall asleep for this amount of time.
Permission denied for writing to storage!
Seems like the donation app wasn\'t purchased through Play Store! If you pirated it, then shame on you!
Enabling this will turn off wake controls when the device is in a pocket.
Possible CPU Cores that lazyplug can use.
Enabling this will turn off wake controls when the screen is turned off by the power key.
Schedule workqueues on awake CPUs to save power.
Autosleep, LCD and Hybrid modes are automatically managed. To manually enable or disable the Power Suspend State choose User Mode. Hybrid uses autosleep & display panel hook.
Kernel power management driver when screen is off. Better battery savings if enabled. Note: You can only change this setting if Power Suspend Mode is in User Mode.
To change the state manually, activate the Userspace mode
Sets 1 CPU maximum online with frequency @1728MHz.
If you want to apply a profile at a specific event, such as launching an application, you have to use Tasker.
Show toast when tasker applies a profile
Show a tile which allows you to select a profile.
Everything you change here is gonna be saved to your profile. But attention! Your settings will also get applied, but won\'t get saved to apply on boot.
This increases the number of times the GPU governor ramp down requests. The higher it is, the more performance you get.
The rate of load of the core (instead of x the # of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled up.
The rate of load of the core (instead of y the #-1 of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled down.
The rate of load of the core (instead of x the # of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled up.
The rate of load of the core (instead of y the #-1 of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled down.
The rate of load of the core (instead of x the # of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled up.
The rate of load of the core (instead of y the #-1 of the core) the frequency for the core is scaled down.
The Read-ahead value on the phone memory.

Register intercept acts like a hook and will enable catching scenario settings and modifying them through delta controls. If a scenario does not have a setting (register) in its base sequence, then it cannot be modified by the hook.

The data and the configuration of the entire application will be erased.

Are you sure?

To avoid configuration failures it is recommended to reboot the system.

Do you want to reboot?
Clear data and restore the application settings
The time reserved for each process in the queue for scale up.
The time reserved for each process in the queue for scale down.
The time reserved for each process in the queue for scale up.
The time reserved for each process in the queue for scale down.
The time reserved for each process in the queue for scale up.
The time reserved for each process in the queue for scale down.
Try to have scheduler requests complete on the CPU core they were made from. Higher values are more aggressive.
Lock your device by swiping by the bottom edge of the screen.
Wake up your device by swiping on the screen.
Set the active I/O elevator algorithm. The Scheduler decides how to handle I/O requests.
The various configuration items which are Scheduler-dependent.
You might get problems with MSM8x26 SoC when setting a high value.
Use only one CPU when screen is off.
Show icons for each section in navigation drawer.
All sections disabled! No profiles for you.
Seekbar will return its current progress. For example your Min is 50 and Max 100 and the seekbar is at 70, it will return 20 as progress.
Current state of the seekbar. By defining min and max an integer array gets created. For example: Min is 50 and Max is 100 and progress is 0, that would mean 50 is the current state of the seekbar.
Select the SELinux state, Permissive/Enforcing.\n(Required a kernel with support.)
Prevent wakelock when Ambient Display disabled.

You can protect ThunderTweaks by setting up a password. Every time you open this application, you have to enter it. If you forget it, simply wipe the data of this application in settings of your device. Don\'t worry I won\'t share your password.
An add-on for MSM Adreno TZ GPU Governor. Developed by faux123.
The default stock kernel profile, known for its smooth performance in basic tasks while maintaining good battery.
Ultra-conservative profile that lets performance take a hit in order to achieve long-lasting battery life.
Need that extra 10 FPS? I got you. Identical to performance in most areas other than the unlocked Graphics performance.
Adaptation of the Spectrum Manager of frap129.\nSelect one of some predefined profiles.
Tuned for top tier performance in standard tasks with many less regressions than Balanced, but maintains battery by limiting graphics.
Thunder II - more conservative profile uses Samsung Plug that lets performance take a hit in order to achieve long-lasting battery life with balanced performance. Edited by XDA@nalas.
Thunder - balanced profile uses AutoSMP hotplug that lets performance take a hit in order to achieve long-lasting battery life with balanced performance. Edited by XDA@nalas.
Ankit - more conservative profile uses Samsung Plug in order to achieve long-lasting battery life with balanced performance. Edited by XDA@nalas and Ankit.
Tuned Profile by Franz that lets you achieve the long battery life with balanced Performance uses Samsung Plug and lower max CPUs frequencies. Edited by XDA@nalas and Franz.
Thunder - conservative profile made by Game Over that lets to achieve long-lasting battery life with balanced performance. Edited by XDA@nalas and Game Over.
Tuned Profile by rtakak for better better battery life with good game performance. Profile uses rtakak profile base and AutoSMP Plug for this purpose. rtakak profile edited by rtakak and XDA@nalas.
Smooth Tuned Profile by Shariq that lets you achieve the long battery life with enhanced Performance. Edited by XDA@nalas and Shariq.
Time until Hotplug starts to work.
If current battery capacity < Store Mode Maximum, then charging will STOP when it reaches this MAX value.
If current battery capacity > Store Mode Minimum, then charging will START when it reaches this MIN value.
Enable to set MAX & MIN battery capacity limits whilst on charge.
The switch will return either 1 (enabled) or 0 (disabled) as argument to your shell script.
Whether the switch is enabled. Return 1 for enabled and 0 for disabled.
When CPU loading crosses the preset threshold, the current CPU is raised to this frequency.
Wake up your device by tapping the screen.
The Transmission Control Protocol is one of the core protocols of the Internet protocol suite (IP), and is so common that the entire suite is often called TCP/IP.
The thermal will use this frequency to throttle the maximum temperature.
If the temperature goes above, the thermal will throttle the CPU frequency to lower the temperature.
Allows you to activate debug mask for thermal operations.
Use only one thermal driver from the following options, using more at the same time may cause unexpected behavior.
Stock thermal driver that prevents device from overheating. This should be disabled if current kernel has an alternative.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s hotplugging. Developed by varunchitre15.
Set a duration when the wake controls will be disabled after the screen goes off.
This will boost your minimum CPU speed if you touch the screen or press a button.
How long the CPU should be boosted after touching the screen.
Boost the minimum frequency the GPU scales up to.
Jump the minimum frequency level to highspeed_clock when the GPU utilization over highspeed_load and over this delayed value.
Jump the minimum frequency level to highspeed_clock when the GPU utilization over this value.
Set the CPU Governor for Ultra Kernel Samepage Merging (UKSM).
Over this threshold the driver will put one more core online.
Interval between taking samples of load across CPUs. Lower means quicker/more erratic.
Device will charge faster when connected with USB. Replug your charger when changing this option.
Choose between displaying list with the most common settings, or all available settings (for advanced users).

VNSWAP - Samsung\'s replacement for ZRAM. It compresses 50% of your RAM in order to provide a smoother multitasking experience at a cost of slightly reduced power efficiency. It comes enabled by default in recent Samsung devices and it is not recommended to be disabled.
How long to wait before turning on any CPUs.
Wakeup Boost is similar to input boost but it occurs when screen is turned on.

Wakelocks are usually there for a reason. Driver and app programmers surely had their reasons to put wakelocks into the code in certain areas. This means, by blocking some of them you can introduce smaller or bigger issues, you can trigger strange side effects and in worst case render the system completely unusable.\n\nBlocking wakelocks is solely your own responsibility.
Bluetooth Wakelock. Disable for better deep sleep and less awake time. Enable for stock behavior.
The bcm4359 Wakelock (GPS chip) is one of the biggest wake sources after Sensorhub & SSP. Disable for better deep sleep and less awake time. Enable for stock behavior.
Select the listing order of the Wakelocks
The SensorHub Wakelock is one of the biggest wake sources. Disable for better deep sleep and less awake time. Enable for stock behavior.
The SSP Wakelock is one of the biggest wake sources after Sensorhub. Disable for better deep sleep and less awake time. Enable for stock behavior.
Wireless Wakelock. Disable for better deep sleep and less awake time. Enable for stock behavior.
Adreno idler will more actively try to ramp down the frequency if this is set to a higher value.
Please select a file with %s extension.
An in-kernel replacement for Qualcomm\'s MPDecision. Developed by bbedward.
First disable ZRAM to be able to adjust this setting.
Unknown compression algorithm or zram not supported!

ZSwap is a lightweight compressed cache for swap pages. It takes pages that are in the process of being swapped out and attempts to compress them into a dynamically allocated RAM-based memory pool. Zswap basically trades CPU cycles for potentially reduced swap I/O.
